titleStmt.title: The marriage of the tvvo great princes, Fredericke Count Palatine, &c: and the Lady Elizabeth, daughter to the Imperial Maiesties of King Iames and Queene Anne vpon Shroue-Sonday last. With the showes and fire-workes vpon the water: as also the masks & reuells, in his Highnes court of White-Hall.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T[homas] C[reede] for William Barley, and are to be sold by W. Wright, at his shop on Snow-hill, nere S. Pulchers church, at the signe of the Harrow,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Ioyfull triumphs at the royall mariage.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop on Snow-hill, nere S. Pulchers church, at the signe of the Harrow
